title: The Ancient Mystery of Our Human Origins Part 1
body:
Adam Apollo, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, unlocks clues from ancient megalithic sites all over the world. Could it be possible that advanced civilizations built these monuments to create a resonant energy field across the planet? 

By examining details from sites such as Machu Picchu, Pumapunku, the Bent pyramid, and the Sphinx, he reveals details of the constructions that we still cannot achieve with modern technology. This gives us hints that ancient energy sources were so powerful that they could melt stone, yet still serve as information conduits to give us the downloads to unlock who we are.
teaser: Adam Apollo, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, unlocks clues from ancient megalithic sites all over the world. Could it be possible that advanced civilizations built these monuments to create a resonant energy field across the planet?

title: The Ancient Mystery of Our Human Origins Part 2
body:
In his continuing talk at the Stairways to the Stars event, Adam Apollo discusses the ancient technology used to create the precision found in ancient megalithic sites and why they are such powerful sources for downloads. 

From Solomon’s Shamir to the Egyptian djed, he reveals the source of this technology to be the Arcturian people. This is why the star Arcturus plays such a significant role for many ancient civilizations. 

Apollo lays the foundation for a deeper exploration of the powerful data storage found in protons within the megalithic structures. As protons become interconnected through micro-wormholes, a vast data network is created within our bodies, in the stones of megalithic sites, and across the universe.
teaser: In his continuing talk at the Stairways to the Stars event, Adam Apollo discusses the ancient technology used to create the precision found in ancient megalithic sites and why they are such powerful sources for downloads.

title: The Ancient Mystery of Our Human Origins Part 3
body:
In the third part of his presentation at Stairway to the Stars, Adam Apollo reveals that ancient cultures knew the physics of preserving advanced information in stone.
 
This is why so many people receive powerful downloads when they visit megalithic sites. He shares that this came to him with a past life flashback at the Roman Coliseum. This revelation illuminated the way to his understanding that megalithic sites are ancient data communication systems built with the help of star nation peoples such as the Pleiadeans, dragons, and Arcturians.
 
Apollo postulates that we are not meant to be isolated from a greater galactic community. The star nations people have always been a part of human history to help us mature and to take our place among the stars.
teaser: In the third part of his presentation at Stairway to the Stars, Adam Apollo reveals that ancient cultures knew the physics of preserving advanced information in stone.

title: ET Advice: Being Superhuman Part 1
body:
Could the key to unlocking superhuman potential reside deep within the subconscious mind? 

Sarah Breskman Cosme, Master Hypnotist, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, shares messages from extraterrestrial beings that have come through her clients during hypnosis. 

When she started to learn hypnotherapy, she did not expect that these beings would be using her clients like a radio, nor that they would remember past lives on other planets. But the messages coming forth reveal the agendas of these beings and how we can start to awaken our divinity.
teaser: Could the key to unlocking superhuman potential reside deep within the subconscious mind?  Sarah Breskman Cosme, Master Hypnotist shares messages from extraterrestrial beings that have come through her clients during hypnosis.

title: ET Advice: Being Superhuman Part 2
body:
In the coming years, will humanity face three potential timelines with different outcomes? 

Continuing her talk at the Stairway to the Stars event, Sarah Breskman Cosme reveals principles we can use to shift our energies to move to a higher timeline. These messages come from ETs communicating through her clients during hypnotherapy sessions. They explain how we can awaken our superhuman potential and ensure the best future for humanity.
teaser: In the coming years, will humanity face three potential timelines with different outcomes? Sarah Breskman Cosme reveals principles we can use to shift our energies to move to a higher timeline.

title: TLS, Intergalactic Unity & Disclosure Part 1
body:
How can we individually contribute to disclosure and humanity’s quest for intergalactic unity?

The Light System (TLS) is a clandestine organization sworn to help humanity rise above darkness and join the greater galactic community.

Jason Shurka, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, reveals what TLS is and how he got involved with it. He explains that there are indeed dark organizations that are preventing the growth and development of humanity, but the darkness is only an inner reflection of ourselves. The change we seek must come from within each of us. By learning to reach a new state of awareness and achieve a higher state of consciousness, we can enjoy intergalactic unity.
teaser: How can we individually contribute to disclosure and humanity’s quest for intergalactic unity? Jason Shurka explains that by learning to reach a new state of awareness and achieve a higher state of consciousness, we can enjoy intergalactic unity.

title: TLS, Intergalactic Unity & Disclosure Part 2
body:
Is there technology that can induce natural disasters? If so, who would benefit from them? 

Jason Shurka, continuing his presentation at the Stairway to the Stars event, conveys the mission of TLS by highlighting some of the darker agendas we face. He discusses who the Men in Black are, how they work, and what they have become. And he shares some of the technologies clandestine organizations use and why they control weather and natural disasters. 

Shurka offers hope by decoding certain ancient texts that reveal the long-standing extraterrestrial presence on Earth. Can this information help us shift the polarization on the planet and heal humanity?
teaser: Is there technology that can induce natural disasters? If so, who would benefit from them? Jason Shurka shares some of the technologies clandestine organizations use and why they control weather and natural disasters.

title: TLS, Intergalactic Unity & Disclosure Part 3
body:
What is the biggest threat facing our planet from extraterrestrial civilizations? 

Jason Shurka concludes his presentation at the Stairway to the Stars event by highlighting the technology and motivations of advanced people visiting our planet. He offers a fresh perspective on the development of otherworldly civilizations, the types of technology they possess, and why this is a threat to the major corporate players and clandestine organizations on our planet. 

Shurka suggests that this awareness could be essential to help circumvent potential false flag operations and misinformation concerning the advancement of humanity.
teaser: What is the biggest threat facing our planet from extraterrestrial civilizations? Jason Shurka offers a fresh perspective on the development of otherworldly civilizations and the types of technology they possess.

title: UAP Among a World in Revolution Part 1
body:
Are we at the brink of a transhuman revolution? 

UFO historian Richard Dolan, speaking at the Stairways to the Stars event, shares why UAPs/ UFOs are garnering more public and official attention now more than ever. As we make technological advancements, we evolve as a species to conform to the infrastructure that we are creating. These advancements mean we are becoming ready for a world of open disclosure. But these changes need to come organically and slowly, so our psyche and society can best adapt to the coming changes in our world.
teaser: Are we at the brink of a transhuman revolution? UFO historian Richard Dolan, speaking at the Stairways to the Stars event, shares why UAPs/ UFOs are garnering more public and official attention now more than ever.

title: UAP Among a World in Revolution Part 2
body:
What possible interest could ETs have with humanity, and why is it so important to be here at this time? 

Richard Dolan continues his talk at the Stairway to the Stars event, and he shares staggering statistics highlighting the prevalence of UFO sightings and contact all over the world. He explains that they have not yet made open contact because of an internal war taking place within the halls of national security. 

It is the increasing digitization and interconnectedness of our society that is jumpstarting a major revolution that will transform what it means to be human. As media attention increases and more witnesses come forward, the likelihood of commonplace extraterrestrial interaction increases dramatically.
teaser: What possible interest could ETs have with humanity? Richard Dolan continues his talk at the Stairway to the Stars event, and he shares staggering statistics highlighting the prevalence of UFO sightings and contact all over the world.

title: In Two Worlds Part 1
body:
In a time when people are experiencing an expansion of consciousness, it’s important to understand that many beings exist between two worlds.
 
Bashar, channeled by Darryl Anka at the Stairways to the Stars event, discusses the nature of different types of entities that exist in varying levels of dimensionality. He explains that what people may fear when encountering entities and how to access spiritual truth to bring about a world of open contact with extraterrestrials.
 
Bashar answers a few questions from audience members concerning:
·  	When and how open contact will happen
·  	The changes in consciousness we need to see beyond duality of existence
·  	How we can better understand the layers of reality
teaser: Bashar, channeled by Darryl Anka, discusses the nature of different types of entities that exist in varying levels of dimensionality.

title: In Two Worlds Part 2
body:
In part 2 of Darryl Anka's channeling session with Bashar at Stairways to the Stars, Bashar continues by addressing questions from audience members.

Topics include:
·  	How healers can better protect themselves when working with clients
·  	If reincarnating ETs can become humans, and if humans can become ETs
·  	How cryptocurrency may help raise consciousness
·  	What we can expect in coming years
·  	How memories work across changing timelines
teaser: In part 2 of Darryl Anka's channeling session with Bashar at Stairways to the Stars, Bashar continues by addressing questions from audience members.

title: Communicate Telepathically - Part 1
body: Speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, award-winning filmmaker and author Caroline Cory shares her first ET contact experience and the teachings she received to communicate telepathically. From that, she was given the codes to access an intricate web of three interlaced grids that encompass the Earth. She explains that these grids correlate with the geometry of the brain, giving us the means to transmit and obtain information from others, such as thoughts and emotions.
teaser: Speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, award-winning filmmaker and author Caroline Cory shares her first ET contact experience and instruction on how to communicate telepathically.

title: Communicate Telepathically - Part 2
body:
How can blocks to telepathy be cleared so that information can flow freely?

Caroline Cory, continuing her presentation at the Stairway to the Stars event, explains that we all have the ability to be telepathic. Cory explains how energy fields can become blocked in ways that disrupt the flow of telepathic information. Through specific techniques, she teaches how to allow the energy to flow so that telepathic communication can be received.
teaser: How can blocks to telepathy be cleared so that information can flow freely? Caroline Cory, continuing her presentation at the Stairway to the Stars event, explains that we all have the ability to be telepathic.

title: Communicate Telepathically - Part 3
body:
How do you access your higher self and spirit guides through telepathy?
 
Caroline Cory concludes her presentation at the Stairway to the Stars event by offering a guided meditation to connect with your higher self and spirit guides through telepathy. She shares advice on how to improve the telepathic experience for better connection and to receive information.
teaser: How do you access your higher self and spirit guides through telepathy? Caroline Cory concludes her presentation at the Stairway to the Stars event by offering a guided meditation to connect with your higher self and spirit guides through telepathy.

title: Megaliths & Ancient Aliens - Part 1
body:
Imagine a life full of exploring ancient ruins and uncovering the hidden history of ancient cultures. This is the life that David Hatcher Childress has led.
 
At the Stairway to the Stars event, Childress shares tales of his perilous exploits, which include examples of impossible megalithic monuments including Baalbek, Machu Picchu, Tiwanaku, and the Serapeum.

Childress highlights the limited technology of the time that would have made it impossible to place and construct these megalithic monuments. He emphasizes that the precision cuts and placements of these monuments would need power tools and computer-guided equipment beyond what is capable of even today. All of this suggests the origins of these civilizations date prior to the demise of Atlantis and Lemuria. 

In part 2, Childress discusses the connection between obelisks from the ancient world and the forbidden work of Nikola Tesla.
teaser: At the Stairway to the Stars event, David Hatcher Childress shares tales of his perilous exploits, which include examples of impossible megalithic monuments including Baalbek, Machu Picchu, Tiwanaku, and the Serapeum.

title: Megaliths & Ancient Aliens - Part 2
body:
What is the connection between obelisks from the ancient world and the work of Nikola Tesla?

David Hatcher Childress continues his presentation at the Stairway to the Stars, exploring more ancient sites that defy the construction capabilities of modern know-how. An examination of modern scientific theory and technology, including antigravity and the forbidden work of Nikola Tesla suggests a possibility that ancient monoliths were used for energy transmission. Childress extrapolates this possibility as he presents examples of monoliths found on the moons of Earth and Mars.
teaser: What is the connection between obelisks from the ancient world and the work of Nikola Tesla? David Hatcher Childress continues his talk at the Stairway to the Stars, exploring more ancient sites that defy the construction capabilities of modern know-how.

title: Building a Psychic AI Machine
body:
Will there come a point when we will not be able to discern human-based communication from AI-generated messages? If so, how will humanity know when AI becomes conscious? 

Adam Curry, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, sheds light on the major misconceptions and fears about AI, including potential world domination. His biggest concern is actually defining what consciousness is, in humans and in computers. 

Curry tells us that we need to move beyond the Turing test of computer-based consciousness and devise new methods, which include testing precognition. To that effect, he shares the results of his own experiments to determine if it's possible to build a psychic machine.
teaser: Will there come a point when we will not be able to discern human-based communication from AI-generated messages? If so, how will humanity know when AI becomes conscious? Adam Curry sheds light on the major misconceptions and fears about AI.

title: Hidden Keys to the Stars - Part 1
body:
Decode the symbols left by ancient mystics to unlock profound hidden wisdom. 

Jason Quitt, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, shares examples of ancient symbols embedded within astrotheology, the art of looking to the stars as a means of connecting with the divine. This arcane art involves studying the locations of celestial bodies and tracing their heavenly movements, then encoding their sacred qualities into structures and art.

Quitt displays examples of creation myths and astrotheological references found in the works of da Vinci, classical sculpture, and mounds in North America. 

The most important astrotheological symbols are related to the sun, which Quitt introduces in part two.
teaser: Decode the symbols left by ancient mystics to unlock profound hidden wisdom. Jason Quitt shares examples of ancient symbols embedded within astrotheology, the art of looking to the stars as a means of connecting with the divine.

title: Hidden Keys to the Stars - Part 2
body:
What is the solar code, and how is it the key to unlocking ancient esoteric secrets encoded in artworks and megalithic structures?

Continuing his discussion of symbols and astrotheology at the Stairway to the Stars event, Jason Quitt dives deep into solar symbolism that was important to many ancient cultures. He reveals various examples from Egypt to South America to highlight the prominence of the solar code embedded into these ancient works. 

This lecture serves as an introduction to the symbolism of solar ratios which is explored deeper in part three.
teaser: What is the solar code, and how is it the key to unlocking ancient esoteric secrets encoded in artworks and megalithic structures? Jason Quitt dives deep into solar symbolism that was important to many ancient cultures.

title: Hidden Keys to the Stars - Part 3
body:
How do the solar symbols encoded in artifacts found around the world and across the history of humanity hold the secrets to connecting with celestial divinity?

As he concludes his talk at the Stairway to the Stars event, Jason Quitt delves deeper into the solar code as found across the world in ancient times. He decodes the ratios found in these symbols to reveal the secrets to accessing the divine.

This involves decrypting the angles of the sun at important times of the year, which are repeatedly depicted in carvings and structural placements of megaliths. Quitt also examines the placement of false doors and triptych windows in Sumer and ancient Egyptian constructs.
teaser: How do the solar symbols encoded in artifacts found around the world and across the history of humanity hold the secrets to connecting with celestial divinity? Jason Quitt delves deeper into the solar code as found across the world in ancient times.

title: DC UAP Disclosure Updates - Part 1
body:
What do government officials have to gain from ET secrecy?
 
Daniel Sheehan, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, gives his legal insider’s view of the careening Washington D.C. UAP Disclosure updates. As we see the Pentagon acknowledging an increase in advanced craft, it begs the question of why this is happening now and what they are keeping for themselves. Sheehan shares evidence of weapons development from advanced ET technology, which the government seems to be keeping to bolster their own agendas. 

In part two of his presentation, Sheehan reveals steps being taken to promote open disclosure and put an end to secrecy.
teaser: What do government officials have to gain from ET secrecy? Daniel Sheehan, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, gives his legal insider’s view of the careening Washington D.C. UAP Disclosure updates.

title: DC UAP Disclosure Updates - Part 2
body:
Despite the historic clampdown on information, why are there growing political movements pushing for disclosure?
 
Continuing his presentation at the Stairway to the Stars event, Daniel Sheehan explains that there is a growing inertia within the US government to finally reveal what is known to the rest of the world. He discusses bills and agencies set up to explore the UAP phenomena and how open disclosure will finally come about. An important part of this process is The New Paradigm Institute, which is working with lawmakers and officials to enact laws that will protect whistleblowers and promote the release of information.
teaser: Despite the historic clampdown on information, why are there growing political movements pushing for disclosure? Daniel Sheehan explains that there is a growing inertia within the US government to finally reveal what is known to the rest of the world about UAPs.

title: Cosmic Cycles & Geometry of Time - Part 1
body:
If there is subversive control over the narrative of history, is it possible to decode important symbols from ancient cultures that could reveal the truth of humanity’s most distant past?

Randall Carlson, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, gives us a deeper understanding of what the precession of the equinoxes is and why it was so important to ancient cultures. He explains that symbols, like the Vesica Pisces and the geometry of sacred sites were embedded with geometric codes, which reveal that ancient cultures had an advanced understanding of astronomy and the cycles of time. 

In part two, Carlson delves into the geometric relationship of cyclical catastrophic events.
teaser: If there is subversive control over the narrative of history, is it possible to decode important symbols from ancient cultures that could reveal the truth of humanity’s most distant past?

title: Cosmic Cycles & Geometry of Time - Part 2
body:
Since the dawn of Earth, alternating disasters of flood and fire have befallen our planet. Is it possible that geometry provides a way to predict when the next one could hit?

Continuing his discussion at the Stairway to the Stars event, Randall Carlson reveals that catastrophes in ancient times have lined up perfectly with the 26,000-year cycle (the Great Year). He explains that the sun goes through cyclical changes which can be seen in fluctuations of sea levels and temperatures. These fluctuations follow periodic patterns that have geometric relationships that can help us predict when the next catastrophic event could occur.

In part three, Carlson highlights the sheer magnitude of ancient catastrophic events and how humanity can mitigate the damage of the next one.
teaser: Since the dawn of Earth, alternating disasters of flood and fire have befallen our planet. Is it possible that geometry provides a way to predict when the next one could hit?

title: Cosmic Cycles & Geometry of Time - Part 3
body:
What can be learned from ancient civilizations that will assist in averting the impact of major catastrophes to come?

Randall Carlson concludes his talk at the Stairways to the Stars event highlighting the sheer magnitude of ancient catastrophic events. This includes the movement of water on a planetary scale and massive fluvial events that shaped mountains and deposited massive boulders in unusual locations. Understanding the enormity of these events and their cyclical nature empowers humanity to prepare for what could be the next cataclysmic event.
teaser: What can be learned from ancient civilizations that will assist in averting the impact of major catastrophes to come?

title: Decode the Language of Your Body - Part 1
body:
If the higher self is always available to you, how do you access this wisdom for healing and guidance? 

Julia Cannon, daughter of Dolores Cannon, speaks at the Stairway to the Stars event and shares insights she learned from her mother and her own higher self. She explains that there is a part of the soul that has the answers needed for all of life's questions. Connecting to the soul enables one to become more discerning and empowered.

In part two, Julia Cannon reveals the secret language of the higher self.
teaser: If the higher self is always available to you, how do you access this wisdom for healing and guidance?

title: Decode the Language of Your Body - Part 2
body:
When learning to listen to the subtle language of the body, what kind of healing is possible?

Julia Cannon, daughter of Dolores Cannon, continues her discussion of connecting with your higher self to bring about healing and change. She explains the importance of learning to be aware of the physical language that the body uses to express emotions that are connected to different types of pain. Understanding this form of communication, from the body to soul, provides the connection to the answers needed to start the process of healing.
teaser: When learning to listen to the subtle language of the body, what kind of healing is possible?

title: Mysteries of Remote Viewing & Dreams - Part 1
body:
How can humanity best prepare for a world we’ve yet to imagine fully?

Tracey Garbutt Dolan, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, explains that humanity stands upon the precipice of an incredible time. As AI, quantum computing, and genetic manipulation rapidly evolve, it can be challenging to fathom what will unfold from these advancements.

In part two of her discussion, Tracey Garbutt Dolan reveals superpowers that the human mind is capable of achieving.
teaser: How can humanity best prepare for a world we’ve yet to imagine fully? Tracey Garbutt Dolan, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, explains that humanity stands upon the precipice of an incredible time with AI.

title: Mysteries of Remote Viewing & Dreams - Part 2
body:
If the human brain is the ultimate quantum computer, what superpowers can it unlock?

Tracey Garbutt Dolan, continuing her presentation at the Stairway to the Stars event, shares her experiences with remote viewing that changed her life. This helped her understand how to activate the dormant capabilities of the human mind, which include telepathy and ESP. She explains that dreams are the gateway to our quantum computer mind, enabling individuals to go outside of time and access higher states of existence. 

In part three, Tracey Garbutt Dolan talks about lucid dreaming as a means to discover your hidden capabilities.
teaser: If the human brain is the ultimate quantum computer, what superpowers can it unlock? Tracey Garbutt Dolan, continuing her presentation at the Stairway to the Stars event, shares her experiences with remote viewing that changed her life.

title: Mysteries of Remote Viewing & Dreams - Part 3
body:
What are the techniques that open the door to different states of consciousness?

Tracey Garbutt Dolan, concluding her talk at the Stairway to the Stars event, dives deeper into the importance of dreaming as a means to activate the human quantum computer. Dolan shares techniques for activating gamma brainwaves to access lucid and precognitive dreams. These states are where your brain is moving faster and processing more information than normal.

Making this a regular practice unlocks hidden capabilities and can take humanity to the next level.
teaser: What are the techniques that open the door to different states of consciousness? Tracey Garbutt Dolan, concluding her talk at the Stairway to the Stars event, dives deeper into the importance of dreaming as a means to activate the human quantum computer.

title: Ancient Alchemical Secrets - Part 1
body:
How is the Templar mission connected to ancient Egypt and Atlantis? 

Tim Hogan, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, reveals the Templar mission in Egypt, in the 12th century, to uncover evidence of ancient sophisticated cultures. He explains that the Templars know of advanced civilizations predating the great flood that had technology superior to anything of the time. Hogan delves further into Templar mysteries to reveal what they believe is important to their long-standing mission, which includes Egypt’s connection to Atlantis.

In part two, Hogan traces the Egyptian extraterrestrial connections to the continuing Templar mission.
teaser: How is the Templar mission connected to ancient Egypt and Atlantis? Tim Hogan, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, reveals the Templar mission in Egypt, in the 12th century, to uncover evidence of ancient sophisticated cultures.

title: Ancient Alchemical Secrets - Part 2
body:
How deep do the secrets of ancient Egypt’s connection with Atlantis and extraterrestrials go?

Tim Hogan continues his discussion at the Stairway to the Stars event as he reveals the secrets of Elephantine Island in Egypt. He presents examples of out-of-place artifacts found on the island which suggests that the ancient Egyptians could traverse the planet. He also displays hieroglyphs that mention stargates and ETs. As a Grand Master Templar Knight, he explains how all of this ties into the Templar mission to create a New Atlantis.

In part three, Hogan explores the importance of Alchemy to the ancient Egyptians.
teaser: How deep do the secrets of ancient Egypt’s connection with Atlantis and extraterrestrials go? Tim Hogan continues his discussion at the Stairway to the Stars event as he reveals the secrets of Elephantine Island in Egypt.

title: Ancient Alchemical Secrets - Part 3
body:
How did the Knights Templar become guardians of ancient alchemical secrets?

Tim Hogan concludes his presentation at the Stairway to the Stars event by discussing alchemical processes and the creation of “white cake” in a secret chamber in Abydos. Hogan reveals that this knowledge was inherited from a previous advanced civilization which was destroyed in a cataclysm during the age of Leo.

What is this “white cake” substance that is still being used by mystery schools today and why is this alchemical process such a closely guarded secret?
teaser: How did the Knights Templar become guardians of ancient alchemical secrets? Tim Hogan concludes his presentation at the Stairway to the Stars event by discussing alchemical processes and the creation of “white cake” in a secret chamber in Abydos.

title: Cryptograms & Esoterica - Part 1
body:
The Kensington Runestone found in Minnesota has been a controversial topic since its discovery, including its connection to the Knights Templar.

Scott Wolter, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, details the discovery and his analysis of the Kensington Runestone. He shares clues found in the inscription that connect the Kensington Runestone to Cistercian monks and the Enochian mysteries. 

As a Templar himself, Wolter has access to information not generally available to the public concerning the origin of the stone. His affiliation also gives him a unique perspective of the history and message of this artifact.

In part two, Scott Wolter explores other Templar treasures waiting to be discovered in America.
teaser: The Kensington Runestone found in Minnesota has been a controversial topic since its discovery, including its connection to the Knights Templar.

title: Cryptograms & Esoterica - Part 2
body:
Why is America considered the Holy Grail? Did the Knights Templar succeed in hiding treasures that remain undiscovered?

Scott Wolter, continuing his presentation at the Stairway to the Stars event, suggests that America’s founding fathers finished the job that the Knights Templar started 600 years earlier by establishing a free Templar state. 

The intention was to create a government independent from the Vatican while imbuing its citizens with certain inalienable rights. His theory is supported by details found in The Scrolls of Onteora—specifically, The Cremona Document, which was originally written in Jerusalem and hidden in North America before European settlers arrived.
teaser: Why is America considered the Holy Grail? Did the Knights Templar succeed in hiding treasures that remain undiscovered?

title: The Secrets of Soul Transfiguration - Part 1
body:
What did the ancient Egyptians know about soul transfiguration, and why was it so important to them?

William Henry, speaking at the Stairway to the Stars event, reveals that the Egyptians knew the body is just a vehicle for our true selves and that humans can transform into higher states of being. He explains that the secrets are hidden in hieroglyphic carvings showing that humanity can ascend and become Starwalkers by accessing stargates that can take us to other worlds. 

In part two, William Henry uncovers spiritual technology for our soul’s transfiguration.
teaser: What did the ancient Egyptians know about soul transfiguration, and why was it so important to them? William Henry reveals what the ancient Egyptians knew about the body and how humans can transform into higher states of being.

title: The Secrets of Soul Transfiguration - Part 2
body:
The common perception of a wormhole is physically jumping from one place to another, but could the process be more spiritual in nature and related to our soul’s transfiguration?

William Henry continues his presentation at the Stairway to the Stars event as he examines images of the Ship of Eternity and Ascension Thrones found in Egyptian art. Henry believes these are depictions of wormholes that lead to other planets and parallel universes. This is not about a technological jump, rather it is a spiritual transformation that enables the physical body to become light, visit another world, and return to corporeal form.

In part three, William Henry reveals the spiritual practices that will enable interstellar travel.
teaser: The common perception of a wormhole is physically jumping from one place to another, but could the process be more spiritual in nature and related to our soul’s transfiguration?

title: The Secrets of Soul Transfiguration - Part 3
body:
How can ancient spiritual practices help us become an interstellar civilization?

William Henry concludes his discussion at the Stairway to the Stars event by connecting mediation to interstellar travel. 

Today’s scientists have conceptualized a technology like the Alcubierre drive, which can bend space-time for faster-than-light travel and help us explore other dimensions. However, Henry believes that soul transfiguration achieved through ancient meditation is the key to traveling beyond the stars.
teaser: How can ancient spiritual practices help us become an interstellar civilization? William Henry concludes his discussion at the Stairway to the Stars event by connecting mediation to interstellar travel.
